metadata.title: CVE-2019-19077 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A memory leak in the bnxt_re_create_srq() function indrivers/infiniband/hw/bnxt_re/ib_verbs.c in the Linux kernel through 5.3.11allows attackers to cause a denial of service (memory consumption) bytriggering copy to udata failures, aka CID-4a9d46a9fe14.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
